titleStmt.title: A collection of speeches of the Right Honourable Henry late Earl of Warrington, viz. I. His speech upon him being sworn mayor of Chester, in November, 1691. II. His speech to the grand-jury at Chester, April 13. 1692. III. His charge to the grand-jury at the quarter-sessions held for the county of Chester, on the 11th. of Octob. 1692 IV. His charge to the grand-jury at the quarter-sessions. Held for the county of Chester, on the 25th. day of April, 1693
titleStmt.author: Warrington, Henry Booth, Earl of, 1652-1694. Selections.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Baldwin, near the Oxford-Arms in Warwick Lane,

notesStmt.note: A1 has a half-title on recto and an advertisemnt on verso.

"The speech of ... Henry ... April 13", "The charge of ... Henry ... the 11th of October" and "The charge of ... Henry ... 25th day of April" have separate title pages dated 1692, 1693 and 1694 respectively; each with separate pagination and register.
Imperfect: Copy at 414:1 lacks second, third and fourth speeches.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
